The Global Compact in Cote d'Ivoire 

Pour accéder à nos pages en français, cliquez ici.

On 11 September, more than 150 representatives from the private sector, government and civil society gathered at Hotel Sofitel in Abidjan for the launch of the Global Compact in Cote d’Ivoire.More information about the launch.

The network is being coordinated by APEX-CI and the UNDP-CI.
